properties.description: Grant OpsTeamUser prod specific prod database tables read access

activities.name: Copy Actual Tank and Item sheet
Delete previous month data
activities.description: Delete all rows in [RAW].[F.ActTankItem] for the previous month from today.

text.value:
DELETE FROM [RAW].[F.ActTankItem]
WHERE [MONTH] = DATEPART(m, DATEADD(MM, -1, GETDATE()))
    AND [YEAR] = DATEPART(year, DATEADD(MM, -1, GETDATE()))

activities.name: Delete null rows
activities.description: Delete all rows where the Unique Ref is null.

dependsOn.activity: Copy Actual Tank and Item sheet

activities.name: Copy sheets to tables
activities.description: Copies each sheet in the lookup sheet to a separate SQL table
